Initializes a new instance of a @see:ChartHitTestInfo object.
@param chart The chart control.
Gets the point in control coordinates to which this ChartHitTestInfo object refers to.

member.summary: Specifies how the LineMarker interacts with the user.

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.Interaction.LineMarkerInteraction.None
member.summary: No interaction, the user specifies the position by clicking.

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.Interaction.LineMarkerInteraction.Move
member.summary: The LineMarker moves with the pointer.

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.Interaction.LineMarkerInteraction.Drag
member.summary: The LineMarker moves when the user drags the line.

member.name: T:C1.Android.Chart.Interaction.LineMarkerLines
member.summary: Specifies the line type for the LineMarker.

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.Interaction.LineMarkerLines.Both
member.summary: Show both vertical and horizontal lines.

member.name: T:C1.Android.Chart.Interaction.LineMarkerAlignment
member.summary: Specifies the alignment of the LineMarker.

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.Interaction.LineMarkerAlignment.Auto
member.summary: The LineMarker alignment adjusts automatically so that it stays inside the boundaries of the plot area.

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.Interaction.LineMarkerAlignment.Bottom
member.summary: The LineMarker aligns to the bottom of the pointer.

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.Interaction.LineMarkerAlignment.Left
member.summary: The LineMarker aligns to the left of the pointer.

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.Interaction.LineMarkerAlignment.Right
member.summary: The LineMarker aligns to the right of the pointer.

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.Interaction.LineMarkerAlignment.Top
member.summary: The LineMarker aligns to the top of the pointer.

member.name: T:C1.Android.Chart.Interaction.PositionChangedArgs
member.summary: Represents the arguments of PositionChanged event.

member.name: P:C1.Android.Chart.Interaction.PositionChangedArgs.Position
member.summary: Gets the target point at which to show the LineMarker.

member.name: T:C1.Android.Chart.Interaction.C1LineMarker
member.summary: Represents an extension of the LineMarker for the FlexChart.

member.name: P:C1.Android.Chart.Interaction.C1LineMarker.X
member.summary: Gets the current x-value as chart data coordinates.

member.name: P:C1.Android.Chart.Interaction.C1LineMarker.Y
member.summary: Gets the current y-value as chart data coordinates.

member.name: P:C1.Android.Chart.Interaction.C1LineMarker.Alignment
member.summary: Gets or sets the alignment of the LineMarker content.
member.remarks: By default, the LineMarker shows to the right, at the bottom of the target point. Use "|" to combine alignment values.

member.name: P:C1.Android.Chart.Interaction.C1LineMarker.Content
member.summary: Gets or sets the content function that allows you to customize the text content of the LineMarker.

member.name: P:C1.Android.Chart.Interaction.C1LineMarker.DragContent
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the content of the marker is draggable when the interaction mode is "Drag".

member.name: P:C1.Android.Chart.Interaction.C1LineMarker.DragLines
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the lines are linked when the horizontal or vertical line is dragged when the interaction mode is "Drag".

member.name: P:C1.Android.Chart.Interaction.C1LineMarker.DragThreshold
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum distance from the horizontal or vertical line that the marker can be dragged.

member.name: P:C1.Android.Chart.Interaction.C1LineMarker.Interaction
member.summary: Gets or sets the interaction mode of the LineMarker.

member.name: P:C1.Android.Chart.Interaction.C1LineMarker.Lines
member.summary: Gets or sets the visibility of the LineMarker lines.

member.name: P:C1.Android.Chart.Interaction.C1LineMarker.HorizontalPosition
member.summary: /// Gets or sets the horizontal position of the LineMarker relative to the plot area. /// Its value range is (0, 1).If set this value,then the line marker's horizontal position is fixed. /// If the value is null or undefined and interaction is set to LineMarkerInteraction.Move or LineMarkerInteraction.Drag, /// the horizontal position of the marker is calculated automatically based on the pointer's position. ///

member.name: P:C1.Android.Chart.Interaction.C1LineMarker.VerticalPosition
member.summary: /// Gets or sets the vertical position of the LineMarker relative to the plot area. /// Its value range is (0, 1). If set this value,then the line marker's vertical position is fixed. /// If the value is null or undefined and interaction is set to LineMarkerInteraction.Move or LineMarkerInteraction.Drag, /// the vertical position of the LineMarker is calculated automatically based on the pointer's position. ///

member.summary: Gets or set the Style of vertical line.

member.summary: Identifies the Vertical line style dependency property.

member.summary: Gets or set the Style of horizontal line.

member.summary: Identifies the Vertical line style dependency property.

member.summary: Occurs after the LineMarker's position changes.

member.name: P:C1.Android.Chart.C1Sunburst.ChildItemsPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the property (or properties) used to generate child items in hierarchical data. Set this property to a string to specify the name of the property that contains an item's child items (e.g. Items). If items at different levels child items with different names, then set this property to an array containing the names of the properties. that contains child items at each level. (e.g. "accounts,checks,earnings")

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.ChartType.Line
member.summary: Shows trends over a period of time or across categories.

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.ChartType.Scatter
member.summary: Shows patterns within the data using X and Y coordinates.

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.ChartType.LineSymbols
member.summary: Shows line chart with a symbol on each data point.

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.ChartType.Area
member.summary: Shows line chart with the area below the line filled with color.

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.ChartType.Spline
member.summary: Displays line chart that plots curves rather than angled lines through the data points.

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.ChartType.SplineSymbols
member.summary: Displays spline chart with symbols on each data point.

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.ChartType.SplineArea
member.summary: Displays spline chart with the area below the line filled with color.

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.ChartType.Bubble
member.summary: Shows Scatter chart with a third data value that determines the size of the symbol.

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.ChartType.Candlestick
member.summary: Presents items with high, low, open, and close values. The size of the wick line is determined by the High and Low values, while the size of the bar is determined by the Open and Close values. The bar is displayed using different colors, depending on whether the close value is higher or lower than the open value.

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.ChartType.HighLowOpenClose
member.summary: Displays the same information as a candlestick chart, except that opening values are displayed using lines to the left, while lines to the right indicate closing values.

member.name: T:C1.Android.Chart.ChartStackingType
member.summary: Specifies whether and how to stack the chart's data values.

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.ChartStackingType.None
member.summary: No stacking. Each series object is plotted independently.

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.ChartStackingType.Stacked
member.summary: Stacked charts show how each value contributes to the total.

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.ChartStackingType.Stacked100pc
member.summary: 100% stacked charts show how each value contributes to the total with the relative size of each series representing its contribution to the total.

member.name: T:C1.Android.Chart.ChartSeriesVisibilityType
member.summary: Specifies whether and where the ChartSeries is visible.

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.ChartSeriesVisibilityType.Visible
member.summary: The series is visible on the plot and in the legend.

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.ChartSeriesVisibilityType.Plot
member.summary: The series is visible only on the plot.

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.ChartSeriesVisibilityType.Legend
member.summary: The series is visible only in the legend.

member.name: T:C1.Android.Chart.ChartElementType
member.summary: Specifies chart element that may be found by the HitTest method.

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.ChartElementType.ChartArea
member.summary: The area within the control but outside the axes.

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.ChartLabelPosition.Left
member.summary: The labels appear to the left of the data points.

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.ChartLabelPosition.Top
member.summary: The labels appear above the data points.

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.ChartLabelPosition.Right
member.summary: The labels appear to the right of the data points.

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.ChartLabelPosition.Bottom
member.summary: The labels appear below the data points.

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.ChartLabelPosition.Center
member.summary: The labels appear centered on the data points.

member.name: T:C1.Android.Chart.PieLabelPosition
member.summary: Specifies the position of data labels on the pie chart.

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.PieLabelPosition.Inside
member.summary: The label appears inside the pie slice.

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.PieLabelPosition.Center
member.summary: The item appears at the center of the pie slice.

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.PieLabelPosition.Outside
member.summary: The item appears outside the pie slice.

member.summary: Specifies the size type for ElementSize object.

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.ElementSizeType.Percentage
member.summary: Size specified in perecents from available space.

member.name: T:C1.Android.Chart.ChartMarkerType
member.summary: Specifies the type of marker to use for the ChartMarkerType property. Applies to Scatter, LineSymbols, and SplineSymbols chart types.

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.ChartMarkerType.Dot
member.summary: Uses a circle to mark each data point.

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.ChartMarkerType.Box
member.summary: Uses a square to mark each data point.

member.name: P:C1.Android.Chart.ElementSize.SizeType
member.summary: Gets or sets the size type.

member.summary: Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current object.

member.name: M:C1.Android.Chart.ElementSize.GetHashCode
member.summary: Returns hash code of the instance.

member.name: T:C1.Android.Chart.ChartOverlappingLabels
member.summary: Specifies how to handle overlapping labels.

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.ChartOverlappingLabels.Show
member.summary: Show all labels, including overlapping ones.

member.name: T:C1.Android.Chart.FitType
member.summary: Specifies fit type for trend line.

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.FitType.Linear
member.summary: Regression fit to the equation Y(x) = C0 + C1*x.

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.FitType.Polynom
member.summary: Regression fit to the equation Y(x) = C0 + C1*x + C2*x2 + : + Cn-1*xn-1, where n - number of terms.

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.FitType.Exponent
member.summary: Regression fit to the equation Y(x) = C0 * exp( C1*x)

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.FitType.Logarithmic
member.summary: Regression fit to the equation Y(x) = C0 * ln(C1*x)

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.FitType.Power
member.summary: Regression fit to the equation Y(x) = C0 * pow(x, C1)

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.FitType.Fourier
member.summary: Regression fit to the equation Y(x) = C0 + C1 * cos(x) + C2 * sin(x) + C3 * cos(2*x) + C4 * sin(2*x) + ...

member.name: T:C1.Android.Chart.MovingAverageType
member.summary: Specifies the type of MovingAverage ChartSeries.

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.MovingAverageType.Simple
member.summary: An average of the last n values.

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.MovingAverageType.Weighted
member.summary: Weighted average of the last n values, where the weightage decreases by 1 with each previous value.

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.MovingAverageType.Exponential
member.summary: Weighted average of the last n values, where the weightage decreases exponentially with each previous value.

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.MovingAverageType.Triangular
member.summary: Weighted average of the last n values, whose result is equivalent to a double smoothed simple moving average.

member.name: T:C1.Android.Chart.Orientation
member.summary: Specifies the orientation of chart element.

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.RadarChartType.LineSymbols
member.summary: Shows line chart with a symbol on each data point.

member.name: F:C1.Android.Chart.RadarChartType.Area
member.summary: Shows line chart with the area below the line filled with color.

member.summary: Creates an instance of FlexPie from a xml definition.

member.name: M:C1.Android.Chart.FlexPie.OnLayout(System.Boolean,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Override the android view OnLayout methed to override the layout logic.

member.name: P:C1.Android.Chart.FlexPie.BindingName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the property that contains the name of the data item.

member.name: P:C1.Android.Chart.FlexPie.Reversed
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines whether angles are reversed (counter-clockwise).
member.remarks: The default value is false, which causes angles to be measured in the clockwise direction.

member.name: P:C1.Android.Chart.FlexPie.Offset
member.summary: Gets or sets the offset of the slices from the pie center.
member.remarks: The offset is measured as a fraction of the pie radius.

member.name: P:C1.Android.Chart.FlexPie.InnerRadius
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the pie's inner radius.
member.remarks: The inner radius is measured as a fraction of the pie radius. The default value for this property is zero, which creates a pie. Setting this property to values greater than zero creates pies with a hole in the middle, also known as doughnut charts.

member.name: P:C1.Android.Chart.FlexPie.StartAngle
member.summary: Gets or sets the starting angle for the pie slices, in degrees.
member.remarks: Angles are measured clockwise, starting at the 9 o'clock position.

member.name: P:C1.Android.Chart.FlexPie.SliceBorderWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the border width for the pie slices.

member.name: P:C1.Android.Chart.FlexPie.SelectedItemOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the offset of the selected slice from the pie center.
member.remarks: Offsets are measured as a fraction of the pie radius.

member.name: P:C1.Android.Chart.FlexPie.SelectedItemPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets the position of the selected slice.
member.remarks: Setting this property to a value other than 'None' causes the pie to rotate when an item is selected. Note that in order to select slices by clicking the chart, you must set the SelectionMode property to "Point".

member.name: P:C1.Android.Chart.FlexPie.DataLabel
member.summary: Gets or sets the data label.

member.name: M:C1.Android.Chart.FlexPie.HitTest(C1.Android.Core.C1Point)
member.summary: Gets a ChartHitTestInfo object with information about the specified point.
member.returns: A ChartHitTestInfo object with information about the point.

members.member: Don't modify this method. But modify parseFlexChartAxisX method and copy it to this method, then replace "AxisX" to "AxisY" and "axisX" to "axisY". Then, change the default value to: AxisLine = false, MajorGrid = true, MajorTickMarks = ChartTickMarkType.None
